summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue from East Cherry Street to the south line of J. H. Reinstorff's Add. in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 18144, creating Local Improvement District No. 1709 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
